comment.author: 29418639@N06
comment._content: A military marching band at the Royal home for KNIL (Royal Dutch East-Indies Army) soldiers Bronbeek, in Arnhem. Netherlands, 1910.

comment.author: 22408734@N08
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Holland before the year 1920 / Nederland van vóór 1920, and we'd love to have this added to the group!
